title: RPA Developer
description:
RPA Developer – UiPath | AdoptDX | Melbourne (Remote, Permanent Role)



AdoptDX is seeking an experienced Robotic Process Automation (RPA) Developer to join our Intelligent Automation Consulting Practice. We’re a growing consulting firm helping businesses accelerate their AI and automation journeys—and this role gives you the chance to shape and deliver impactful automation solutions.



About the Role

As an RPA Developer, you’ll design, build, deploy, and support automation solutions using UiPath and Power Automate. A strong focus on UiPath Document Understanding and Machine Learning is essential. You’ll collaborate closely with business stakeholders and technical teams, ensuring automation outcomes deliver real business value.

This is a permanent role based in Melbourne, with full remote flexibility.



Key Responsibilities

1. Deliver end-to-end automation across the full SDLC: design, build, test, deploy, and maintain.
2. Translate business needs into scalable automation solutions aligned with security and architectural standards.
3. Build reusable frameworks and components to accelerate automation delivery.
4. Develop and execute robust test plans to ensure solution reliability.
5. Maintain and enhance existing automation processes for business continuity.
6. Keep documentation clear and comprehensive for scalability.
7. Implement monitoring and reporting to track automation performance.
8. Support IT teams in setting up automation environments and prerequisites.
9. Stay current with supported versions of UiPath and automation tools.
requirements:
Required Skills & Experience

Strong hands-on experience with UiPath, including Document Understanding and Machine Learning.
Proven ability to design and implement Document Understanding workflows.
Solid background in Agile development and full automation lifecycle delivery.
Strong skills in delivery planning, support, and maintenance.
Experience with APIs (ideally Salesforce) and .NET.
Ability to work closely with SMEs and document high-quality solutions.
Experience collaborating with onshore and offshore development teams.


Qualifications

UiPath Certification will be desirable.
Any Tech certification
5+ years RPA development experience with UiPath.
4-7 years software development experience across multiple programming languages.
2-3 years integration experience (JSON, SOAP, XML, YAML).
Bachelor’s degree in IT, Computer Science, Engineering, or related fields.

title: Digital Transformation Consultant
description: Help enterprise clients navigate their digital transformation journey through AI and automation implementation. Conduct business analysis, design transformation strategies, and oversee technology adoption.
requirements: 3+ years consulting experience, business analysis skills, knowledge of AI/RPA technologies, excellent communication skills, willingness to travel, MBA preferred.
